short_summary: purchase of collaborative furniture (soft seating) for Hybrid project
description: The department needs: Collaborative Soft Seating by March 25th, 2023.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Collaborative Furniture (Soft Seating)

#### Reference: 
WS4231653058-Doc4233685139

#### Amendment: 
Amendment 3

#### Solicitation Number: 
WS4231653058

#### Publication Date: 
November 14, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date: 
December 8, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

#### Amendment Date: 
December 1, 2023

#### Expected Contract Start Date: 
March 20, 2024

#### Expected Contract End Date: 
N/A

#### Tender Status: 
Closed

#### Commodity Code: 
*Guest seating*
*Lounge seating*
*Bench seating*

#### Procurement Category: 
Goods

#### Procurement Method: 
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria: 
Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements: 
The tender is open to bidders participating in the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Contact Information:

Please submit all required documents and bids by December 8, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST to the following contact:

Christopher Finnigan
Services publics et Approvisionnement Canada
 Public Services and Procurement Canada
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Tender Description:

Public Services and Procurement Canada, on behalf of Transport Canada, seeks to acquire collaborative soft seating for a project. The tenderer must submit their bid and associated documents by the closing date and time. Bids received after the closing time will be declared non-responsive. The expected contract start date is March 20, 2024.
